item.description:
Join us for a very special evening of food & inspiration:
Dave the Raw Food Trucker is on a Cross Country Tour & he is making a stop in Portland, ME to share his story with you. Elizabeth & Maggie of Kids Gone Raw are hosting him on Munjoy Hill for a special evening that includes a raw-licious dinner buffet, followed by an awe-inspiring talk with Dave the Raw Food Trucker & the Whitings.  If you aren't familiar with Dave & his story, just google him.  His story is RAWsome!  Only $25.

Seating is limited, so please sign up today:
http://davetherawfoodtrucker.eventbee.com

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Dave The Raw Food Trucker - Raw Vegan Dinner & Talk
